additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, corner, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Apartment is located in the center of Tbilisi on Chavchavadze avenue. Apartment is available from 1 September 2015. Apartment is in historical beautiful building. Apartment comes with furniture. Ceiling is almost 3.5 meters. Suburb is safe. Apartment is bright. Apartment is equipped with all appropriate technics (TV, Fridge, Microwave, washing machine,Air Conditioner etc). Apartment is 120 Sq.m + 2 balconies. Balconies view are on Chavchavadze and Taktakishvili streets. From balconies you may view beautiful trees and mountain.Main Entrance of the building is wide and locked. Apartment is equipped with central heating. Apartment is in a vintage style with modern bathroom and kitchen. For the further details or visits, please call us on following number +995 577 42 31 39  or +995 571 445 333 and e mail nuuk_mshvidobadze@yahoo.com

details.address: Tbilisi, Vake,  Vake, I. Chavchavadze Ave.
